title: Once Upon a Rainbow, Volume Three
description: Your favorite stories from childhood have a new twist. Seven fairy tales of old with characters across the LGBTQIA+ spectrum.Green Things Grow from Cinders by A.E. Ross – Glass slippers aren’t for everyone.Gretel on Her Own by Elna Holst – This time around, Gretel Kindermann is on her own. Or is she?Bremen Town Musicians by Mark Lesney – Loss and love on the road to Bremen Town.The Scent of Magic by N.J. Romaine – Who can win a hunt against the Big Bad Wolf?The Rescue by Sam Burns – Saving princesses is hard work. Getting out of marrying them is harder.Loose in the Heel, Tight in the Toe by Valentine Wheeler – The shoe fits, the prince is won: now what?Baile de la Marioneta by W.M. Fawkes – No one else can pull his strings.
author: W.M. Fawkes
